20 
No 3 
Ovibos Dawkins 
[paragraph]6. <u>Range in Time. <s>Fossil remains<\s> Fossil remains<\u> That the fossil remains 
of ovibos found in Europe Asia and America are specifically 
identical with the <u>Ovibos Moschatus<\u> is admitted by all 
naturalists conversant with the latter animal, an opinion 
that a most careful analysis of characters compels me to 
endorse. The first notice of the fossil we owe to the 
great Russian naturalist D<sup>r<\sup> Palla, who in 1772 describes
